head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COLE, VIRGINIA E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COLE, VIRGINIA E.

block.p: COLE-Virginia E. Of Floral Park, NY, on September 1, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Robert D. Cole Sr. Beloved mother of Carleen, Robert Jr. and Christopher. Loving sister of Raymond Dukes and Marilyn Bilpuh. Cherished grandmother of six. Friends may call Sunday and Monday, 2-5 and 7-9:30 PM, at the Thomas F. Dalton Funral Home, 29 Atlantic Ave., Floral Park, NY (at RR Plaza). Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10:30 AM, at Our Lady of Victory R.C. Church. Interment Mt. St. Mary's Cemetery.
